channel.title: Serendipitous Oulipo Haiku
channel.description: Generated haikus based on the serendipitous-oulipo-haiku project

item.title: immerse all of you
item.description:
immerse all of you
with the steel beams of your thoughts
to start to become

item.title: I found you — fallen
item.description:
I found you — fallen
converse in intimate joy
dreading suffering

item.title: lofty sequoia
item.description:
lofty sequoia
glorious touching the earth
parametric us

item.title: I wish I knew how
item.description:
I wish I knew how
pull me to that single point
winter steps on spring

item.title: a beautiful Run
item.description:
a beautiful Run
take a breath and do something
trailing a mother

item.title: in an empty lot
item.description:
in an empty lot
and dip myself in the clouds
you bring me such joy

item.title: lift yourself with breath
item.description:
lift yourself with breath
immerse me in your language
winter chandeliers

item.title: there’s this ritual
item.description:
there’s this ritual
the best gift I could give you
utter abundance

item.title: fog again today
item.description:
fog again today
completely immerse yourself
spilled to inspire change

item.title: the various V’s
item.description:
the various V’s
wrap and hug life that once was
until it doesn’t

item.title: I could write more than
item.description:
I could write more than
moss draping over branches
filtered solar light

item.title: yellow river sky
item.description:
yellow river sky
looking down, your tender roots
of water and ducks

item.title: your palm faces down
item.description:
your palm faces down
with bits of pollen and mud
to keep it secure

item.title: I saw you today
item.description:
I saw you today
in your autumn glow, right now
you lay cleft at dawn

item.title: in an empty lot
item.description:
in an empty lot
of dancing curves of sunshine
smile, and hands. Nana

item.title: you must bury things
item.description:
you must bury things
silences itself only
waiting for sunset

item.title: could this day just be
item.description:
could this day just be
I was enmeshed in spirals
versions you can be

item.title: just for a moment
item.description:
just for a moment
just before this headland warmed
joyful perfection

item.title: to connect with you
item.description:
to connect with you
glorious touching the earth
your smile — a delight

item.title: I folded this crane
item.description:
I folded this crane
that will lead you down that path
earth and sky as one

item.title: vestiges of trees
item.description:
vestiges of trees
remove leafs at the right time
in my green garden

item.title: generative art
item.description:
generative art
it was always here — ready
transforming in growth

item.title: I just glimpsed the light
item.description:
I just glimpsed the light
you yell and fight over it
holding tight; reaching

item.title: this colorful mist
item.description:
this colorful mist
breathe it, let it permeate
now realized and walked

item.title: the fractals of us
item.description:
the fractals of us
maybe all flowers do this
at the oceans breath

item.title: evening clouds whisper
item.description:
evening clouds whisper
that draw you in; and call you
boardwalk to the sky

item.title: there exists nothing
item.description:
there exists nothing
origami creases you
connected to Earth

item.title: night time thoughts bring focus
item.description:
night time thoughts bring focus
does not point its beam at you
ever evolving

item.title: all tracks in your life
item.description:
all tracks in your life
still budding though you lay down
when alone with time

item.title: I folded this crane
item.description:
I folded this crane
to journey beneath the stars
that stands still and dark

item.title: oh, yes, this is it!
item.description:
oh, yes, this is it!
the depths of the light and dark
the ultimate hug

item.title: great white fawn lily
item.description:
great white fawn lily
in and out of your being
completing a proof

item.title: sometimes it’s the clouds
item.description:
sometimes it’s the clouds
like the sound of waves pulling
strength in this small life

item.title: play brings character
item.description:
play brings character
such precious time in this life
iota of earth

item.title: the lenses we have
item.description:
the lenses we have
turbulence with breath, movement
not just in shadow

item.title: you gather yourself
item.description:
you gather yourself
nodes in the past and future
this brief existence

item.title: I am condensate
item.description:
I am condensate
catching the little white moths
this brief existence

item.title: simple churns of thought
item.description:
simple churns of thought
cross a bridge from the beneath
with grains of pollen

item.title: breadcrumbs of sunbeams
item.description:
breadcrumbs of sunbeams
settle down in the long light
white gives way to green

item.title: in the mossy dusk
item.description:
in the mossy dusk
you are like honey and light
with all of your heart

item.title: the seven of them
item.description:
the seven of them
in one sedum, young to old
western wood-peewee

item.title: the seven of them
item.description:
the seven of them
as a Bee is to flower
iterated views

item.title: sunflowers bow their
item.description:
sunflowers bow their
and find they are but water
hundreds of years old

item.title: some of us are those
item.description:
some of us are those
I see you and your colors
waiting for sunset

item.title: little winter bee
item.description:
little winter bee
a permission slip to be
glitches in water

item.title: gratitude sneaks up
item.description:
gratitude sneaks up
too far ahead of your path
with grains of pollen

item.title: repose beneath sky
item.description:
repose beneath sky
too far ahead of your path
transforming in growth

item.title: the weight of a cloud
item.description:
the weight of a cloud
droplets, the bubbles in air
have ever loved me

item.title: the color palettes
item.description:
the color palettes
always reaching to the west
due to gratitude

item.title: the outline of death
item.description:
the outline of death
in fall you came, but no more
relax your creases

item.title: I keep company
item.description:
I keep company
I thought you might sit with me
with grains of pollen

item.title: my luck dragon came
item.description:
my luck dragon came
through my entire being
covered in passion

item.title: the most open paths
item.description:
the most open paths
to manifest silver clouds
charcoal to paper

item.title: I just glimpsed the light
item.description:
I just glimpsed the light
of dancing curves of sunshine
ablutions from sky

item.title: breadcrumbs of sunbeams
item.description:
breadcrumbs of sunbeams
constructed with four circles
in my coffee cup

item.title: I saw the sunrise
item.description:
I saw the sunrise
earlier now. Lets us know
breath in this wildwood

item.title: untangling this mess
item.description:
untangling this mess
pack them like bijou trinkets
at the shore of soul

item.title: there you are, my hawk
item.description:
there you are, my hawk
make this icosahedron
to find what is deep

item.title: faint little circle
item.description:
faint little circle
upon a forest by sea
envelope my eyes

item.title: plot the Devil’s Curve
item.description:
plot the Devil’s Curve
origami creases you
filtered solar light

item.title: thank you my river
item.description:
thank you my river
through my entire being
and then sweep away

item.title: The structure of you
item.description:
The structure of you
in your layers as they fall
warmth from radiance

item.title: The structure of you
item.description:
The structure of you
come to hold my hand, farewell
utterly selfless

item.title: you know you must go
item.description:
you know you must go
the skeletal curvature
revealing true form

item.title: oh, how you long to
item.description:
oh, how you long to
accidental flushing dog
joyful perfection

item.title: I saw you today
item.description:
I saw you today
and find they are but water
to be here and now

item.title: I breathed alder air
item.description:
I breathed alder air
that hug me; sitting so small
air, to tree, to air

item.title: to be a raven
item.description:
to be a raven
and I will love every
what currents we make

item.title: you reach down into
item.description:
you reach down into
paint the histories of tides
so wondrously new

item.title: the silver lining
item.description:
the silver lining
for receding from my path
you just have to look

item.title: a swallow ballet
item.description:
a swallow ballet
revealing ancient forest
have ever loved me

item.title: do you like to think
item.description:
do you like to think
I will reach with all my time
like old memories

item.title: the weight of a cloud
item.description:
the weight of a cloud
together in flight and tree
days, loops, through the years

item.title: so, obviously
item.description:
so, obviously
you peek over the grapes to
absolute beauty

item.title: play brings character
item.description:
play brings character
I see you and your colors
glorious — alone

item.title: winter sun gives hints
item.description:
winter sun gives hints
to the heights that you take wing
to start to become

item.title: even the strongest
item.description:
even the strongest
to a gratitude’s ocean
paths, trails of wonder

item.title: you ensure the life
item.description:
you ensure the life
break free from these tangled limbs
of growth and decay

item.title: sometimes luminance
item.description:
sometimes luminance
there’s hundreds of finish lines
a vibrant puddle

item.title: you were in my hands
item.description:
you were in my hands
the dunes of me — parallel
brightening shadows

item.title: coding with patterns
item.description:
coding with patterns
are but loops in the garment
of an inner light

item.title: ink can be messy
item.description:
ink can be messy
come to hold my hand, farewell
charcoal to paper

item.title: somehow blooms do form
item.description:
somehow blooms do form
found in every little
drops encompass me

item.title: this path is flooded
item.description:
this path is flooded
to truly reflect on you
when you get to peak

item.title: sometimes luminance
item.description:
sometimes luminance
for being steadfast, constant
of your consciousness

item.title: autumn calls us all
item.description:
autumn calls us all
on dead branches among clouds
of growth beneath soil

item.title: when I banished you
item.description:
when I banished you
silences itself only
view of this wonder

item.title: what seems like chaos
item.description:
what seems like chaos
place them in your mind’s pocket
living in circles

item.title: a Fermat spiral
item.description:
a Fermat spiral
with strokes of grass and azure
beauty in my home

item.title: I treat my tea bag
item.description:
I treat my tea bag
plant me beside, beneath one
our reality

item.title: there is a pulse here
item.description:
there is a pulse here
will still have footsteps of light
to be a focus

item.title: my orchid’s face me
item.description:
my orchid’s face me
a thousand poems of you
leap up to kiss sky

item.title: the sea leaves presents
item.description:
the sea leaves presents
I fly with all of them that
that stands still and dark

item.title: be the blank canvas
item.description:
be the blank canvas
get lost in thought and dream big
a precious orchid

item.title: grab the sky and loam
item.description:
grab the sky and loam
orchid blooming for a year
only roots remain

item.title: swimming in a sea
item.description:
swimming in a sea
has become an impetus
places for quiet

item.title: the currents of geese
item.description:
the currents of geese
immersing in the moment
drops encompass me

item.title: oh, oyster catcher
item.description:
oh, oyster catcher
gulping berries at sun set
reflect and renew

item.title: “it’s the hill your on”
item.description:
“it’s the hill your on”
swiftly move with such volume
together a seed

item.title: you gather yourself
item.description:
you gather yourself
in the rain beneath this sky
shoot; despite ourselves

item.title: do you ever just
item.description:
do you ever just
my precious chickadee-dee
in this existence

item.title: I feel all the strands
item.description:
I feel all the strands
closest to the sun today
one drop fills my soul

item.title: brace yourself here; now
item.description:
brace yourself here; now
lead you to the horizon
and create you own

item.title: long shadows pull me
item.description:
long shadows pull me
that provide us with brilliance
joyfully alive

item.title: as you look down here
item.description:
as you look down here
changing, growing, condensing
puddle of raindrops

item.title: I breath in and out
item.description:
I breath in and out
so they could all see this bird
at the oceans breath

item.title: in my cup, coffee
item.description:
in my cup, coffee
lift into the sky above
breath in this wildwood
